title: Haiti gang ambushes, kills 3 policemen as violence soars
description: It's the latest attack against an under-resourced, underfunded police department

title: 2 police officers, suspect killed during shootout in Wisconsin
description: Two police officers were killed Saturday following a gunfire exchange with a suspect during a traffic stop in Wisconsin, according to Wisconsin's Department of Justice.

title: Texan declared innocent in slaying now arrested in another
description: Police say a Houston man declared innocent in 2021 after being convicted in a fatal stabbing and serving seven years in prison has been charged with murder

title: Suspect arrested in Florida after killings of 3 teens
description: A 16-year-old boy has been arrested in the killings of three teenagers in central Florida was captured by authorities, days after another teenager and a 12-year-old were charged in the deaths

title: 78-year-old bank heist suspect: 'I didn't mean to scare you'
description: A 78-year-old woman with two past bank robbery convictions faces new charges after authorities allege she handed a teller a note that said “I didn’t mean to scare you” during a recent Missouri heist

title: Home-based workers became younger, more diverse in pandemic
description: People working from home became younger, more diverse, better educated and more likely to move during the COVID-19 pandemic

title: Tensions build around Jerusalem shrine after Syria rockets
description: Israeli warplanes and artillery have struck targets in Syria following rare rocket fire from its northeastern neighbor

title: Health secretary slams abortion pill ruling as 'not America'
description: The nation’s top health official says a court ruling threatening the availability of a main drug used in medication abortion was “not America.”

title: Trump's legal priority will be seeking to dismiss his indictment, his attorney says
description: Trump’s attorney Jim Trusty's priority is focusing on a dismissal of Trump's indictment rather than his heated rhetoric about the Manhattan judge and prosecutor

title: 2 Wisconsin police officers killed in traffic stop shooting
description: Two Wisconsin police officers were killed in a shooting during a traffic stop on Saturday

title: Woods withdraws before completing 3rd round of Masters
description: Tiger Woods withdrew from the Masters before the resumption of the third round Sunday, ending his streak of completing all 72 holes of every tournament he has played at Augusta National as a professional

title: WATCH:  Grandfather surprised to learn newborn named after him
description: A man began to tear up the moment he learned his newly-born granddaughter was named after him when he noticed a blanket and a sign with the baby's name, Adaline Terry.

title: Pope at Easter: Pray for Ukrainian, Russian people, refugees
description: Pope Francis has invoked prayers for both the Ukrainian and Russian people in his Easter message

title: WATCH:  Cute critters get into the Easter spirit
description: Lots of zoos are offering the animals a chance to have a special day.

title: Trial date set for John Carter, suspect in fiance Katelyn Markham's murder
description: With the trial of John Carter, suspect in the murder of his fiance, to begin in the June 2024, the victim’s father said he hoped to close a dark chapter in his life.

title: Germany: Hamburg fire smoke halts trains, generates warning
description: Police have warned people in Hamburg, Germany, to close their windows early after a large fire that engulfed several warehouses sent black, chemical-laden smoke drifting over the city

title: 3 people, suspect killed after domestic violence incident in Orlando, Florida
description: Three people and one suspect are dead after a suspected domestic violence incident turned deadly in Orlando, Florida, early Sunday morning, police said.

title: 3 taken to hospital after Delaware mall shooting
description: A shopping mall in Delaware has been evacuated and closed because of a shooting.
